remarks: Limit of the difference of two converging sequences.  Proposition 12-2.1(b) of [Gleason] p. 168.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climadd.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climadd.6 $e |- ( ph -> H e. X ) $.
climadd.7 $e |- ( ph -> G ~~> B ) $.
climadd.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climadd.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climsub.h $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) - ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
climsub $p |- ( ph -> H ~~> ( A - B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d H k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
